dc_title_s: Map of the state of New York, showing the boundaries of counties & townships, the location of cities, towns and villages, the courses of rail roads, canals & state roads
dc_description_s: 1 map : hand colored ; 47 x 59 cm|Relief shown by hachures.|Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington.|Hand colored.|Insets: The St. Lawrence River from the New York state line to Quebec -- City of New York with part of Brooklyn and Williamsburg -- Vicinity of New York, showing the line of the Croton Aqueduct and the Hudson River to Newburg.
